tours.start_step:
Hello, this is a mini tour of Hebreway: {{entity}}! Here you can familiarize yourself with the functionality of this application.
To exit the tour, press the Escape key or click on the cross.
tours.finish_step:
You have completed the Hebreway: {{entity}} tour!
To exit the tour, press the Escape key or click on the cross.

footnote_from.page_header: These are the buttons to control the footnote
footnote_from.word: This is a Hebrew footnote input box
footnote_from.show_without_nikkudot:
If you want to enter a description without vowels, then click on the switch. 
Note that a field without vows is required, and if you save only a field with vows, a field without vows will be automatically generated.
footnote_from.word_meaning: Displayed here are input fields for values in other languages and a value in simplified Hebrew
footnote_from.audio: An audio file is displayed here, if it does not exist, then you can download it by clicking the «Download or record audio» button.
footnote_from.external_reference: Here you can enter a link to an already existing footnote on another site.

lesson_form.lesson_form_title: Here you can enter the lesson names.
lesson_form.text_task_content_edit_from_content: These fields are for entering a paragraph. The translation is entered on the left, and the original text on the right.
lesson_form.lesson_form_exercises: Here you can choose which exercises to include in the lesson.
lesson_form.text_task_content_edit_from_hide_or_show: You can always hide a paragraph from the student, just press the switch.
lesson_form.text_task_content_edit_from_add_or_del_p: If you want to add or remove a paragraph, you should pay attention to these buttons.

american_questions.question: This is the question for the student.
american_questions.correct_answer: In this field, you must enter the correct answer to the question.
american_questions.wrong_answers: Other answer options are indicated here. Please note that only incorrect options are found here.
american_questions.stepper: This is a switch that allows you to move from one question to another.

choose_words_by_categories.add_category: Before starting work, you need to add a category. Click and you will see a window for creating a new category.
choose_words_by_categories.selector: In this field, you can select the category with which you want to work.
choose_words_by_categories.edit_category: In order to edit a category, just click on this button.
choose_words_by_categories.text: After choosing a category, select the words that you want to refer to this category by simply clicking with the left mouse button.

collect_sentences_from_words.question: This is where the original sentence is introduced, which is broken down into words.
collect_sentences_from_words.add_question: Click on this button to add a new sentence to this exercise.
collect_sentences_from_words.remove_question: Click this button to remove the displayed sentence from the exercise.
collect_sentences_from_words.stepper: It is a switch that allows you to move from one sentence to the next.

essay.themes: The topics that will be presented to the student for selection are displayed here.
essay.add_theme_item: Click on this button to add a new topic.
essay.remove_theme_item: Click on this button to delete the theme opposite the button.

explain_idea.paragraphs: All paragraphs of text are displayed here.
explain_idea.checkbox: Click to add or remove this paragraph from the exercise.

insert_missing_words.text: It is displayed here, in which you can click on any word in order to mark it as guessed.

order_paragraphs_in_text.paragraphs: All paragraphs visible to the student are displayed here.
order_paragraphs_in_text.paragraphs_items: To set the initial order displayed to the student, drag the paragraph to another position.
order_paragraphs_in_text.paragraphs_items_control: Or use the arrows to the right of the paragraph.

select_missing_words.text: This displays the text that the student will see. When you click on any word, a window for setting these words will open, where you will have to enter the wrong options to select a student or remove the wrong options.

supplement_sentences.sentence: Enter the beginning or end of a sentence in this field.
supplement_sentences.change_type: Choose how the text you entered will be reflected as the beginning or end of the sentence.
supplement_sentences.add_sentence: If you want to add more offers, click on the 'Add new sentence' button.
supplement_sentences.remove_sentence: If you want to delete the selected offer, click on the 'Remove sentence' button.
supplement_sentences.stepper: It is a switch that allows you to move from one sentence to the next.

supplement_text.text: The text that needs to be executed is displayed here.
supplement_text.change_type: Choose how the selected text will be reflected as the beginning or end of the sentence.
supplement_text.control: Click to add or remove this paragraph from the exercise.

text_questions.question: Enter the question that the student should answer in this field.
text_questions.add_question: Click this button to add a new question.
text_questions.remove_question: Click this button to delete the current question.
text_questions.stepper: It is a switch that allows you to move from one question to another.

true_false_questions.question: Enter the question that the student should answer in this field.
true_false_questions.answer: Choose the answer that is correct for this statement.
true_false_questions.add_question: Click this button to add a new question.
true_false_questions.remove_question: Click this button to delete the current question.
true_false_questions.stepper: It is a switch that allows you to move from one question to another.
